message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which holds immense value and potential for growth. Given its significance to both of us, I propose a transaction price of $1,200,000. This amount reflects not only the intrinsic worth of the product but also the strategic benefits it could bring to your endeavors. Should you choose to accept this offer, we can arrange for a smooth and secure transaction. If you require any further information or have questions about the product, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of working together.
